column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////first time at deep dish... was delish
column2: but i m not sure i want another one in a long time because it was heavy and quite filling... if your new to chicago and want to have the deep dish experience
column3: you must go check this place out and make your own interpretation... place gets super busy by the way; we went at an awkward time between lunch and dinner and didnt have to wait..
